name: Chewtle
description: The Snapping Pokémon. It starts off battles by attacking with its rock-hard horn, but as soon as the opponent flinches, this Pokémon bites down and never lets go.

abilities.name: Strong Jaw
abilities.description: For biting moves activated by this Pokémon (Bite, Thunder Fang, Crunch, etc.), they may roll the damage twice and choose either total.

abilities.name: Shell Armor
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to extra damage dealt by a Critical Hit.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.description: This Pokémon's speed is doubled in rainy conditions.
